tutorials.title: Help
tutorials.description: Swipe right to find out about all of the useful features hidden in this App

tutorials.title: Search for a Connection
tutorials.description: Swipe down to search for the connection you have set in the search bar

tutorials.title: Settings
tutorials.description: Adjust Search Paramters, Notifications and more

tutorials.title: Favorites
tutorials.description: Save your most used Stops by tapping the heart

tutorials.title: Pin a trip
tutorials.description: Swipe a trip to the left to pin it and get notified before it starts

tutorials.title: Most used Connections
tutorials.description: Swipe down with two fingers to view your most used connections
